attributes.action: Remove MPs expenses from pay, bring staff under civic responsibility.
attributes.additional_details: In order to bring MPs in-line with the rest of Britain, they too need to make sacrifices, sacrifices for the greater good, to help minimise the burden on working people's taxation, to help elevate the cost of living, inflation, and general bills.
attributes.background: To bring MPs back in line with the working class, and more in-tune with their constituents, the proposal of expenses to be abolished, replaced with staff and offices being put in civic control, second home expenses to be blocked, only mortgages for lived in second homes to be paid savings taxpayers.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here: http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
